go_data.justification: PTH increases the synthesis of 1,25(OH)2D, which regulates blood calcium levels.
PTH increases the synthesis of 1,25(OH)2D, which regulates blood calcium levels through intestinal absorption, renal reabsorption and release from bone stores.
Parathyroid hormone (PTH) is controlled in the kidneys and secreted by the parathyroid gland.
